Episodes.Title: Sins of the Past
Episodes.Plot: Xena battles an evil warlord, a vengeful Cyclops and harsh weather during her journey home to Amphipolis, where she's joined by a young woman named Gabrielle, who's a resourceful young protege.
Episodes.GuestStars: Jay Laga'aia, Stephen Hall, Linda Jones, Geoff Snell, Anton Bentley, Patrick Wilson, Wally Green, Roydon Muir, Huntly Eliott, Winston Harris, David Perrett

Episodes.Title: Chariots of War
Episodes.Plot: Xena defends a town against a band of thugs led by a father and son duo, and when she is wounded, Gabrielle is left worrying for the warrior princess.
Episodes.GuestStars: Nick Kokotakis, Jeff Thomas, Stuart Turner, Patrick Morrison, Ruth Morrison, Morgan Palmer-Hubbard, Dane Jerro, Robert Harte, Nigel Godfrey

Episodes.Title: Dreamworker
Episodes.Plot: When Gabrielle is kidnapped by a mystic, Xena enters an altered state of consciousness and must face ghosts from her past in order to rescue her friend.
Episodes.GuestStars: Nathaniel Lees, Desmond Kelly, Sydney Jackson, Colin Francis, John Palmer, Bruce Hopkins, Matthew Jeffs, Michael Daly, Peter Phillips, Grant Boucher, Lawrence Wharerau, Patrick Smith, Polly Baigent

Episodes.Title: Cradle of Hope
Episodes.Plot: Xena employs stealthy maneuvers to protect an infant who an oracle claims will one day usurp the King's throne. Meanwhile, Xena must also make sure that Pandora, the granddaughter of the legendary original, is able to reset the lock on her precious box.
Episodes.GuestStars: Mary Elizabeth McGlynn, Edward Newborn, Simon Prast, Susan Winter, Beryl Te Wiata, Carl Straker, Kirstie O'Sullivan, Paul Norell, Paul Minifie, Lathan Gains, Alan De Malmanche, Tony Bishop, Christine Bartlett, La

Episodes.Title: The Path Not Taken
Episodes.Plot: In order to stop a war Xena must save a princess that has been taken from her home. The kidnapping could lead to a war. Xena realizes that a weapons dealer is the one that has caused everything. When she tracks the dealer, she meets her old love Marcus, but she is not sure how she feels about him.
Episodes.GuestStars: Bobby Hosea, Stephen Tozer, Iain Rea, Crawford Thompson, Peter Saena-Brown, Christopher Mayer, Danny Lineham, Ross Harper, Sam Holland, Meryl Main, Phaedra Hurst, Christian Hodge, Bill Johnson, John O'Leary, Jimi

Episodes.Title: The Reckoning
Episodes.Plot: Xena is mistaken for the killer who attacked and murdered a gropu of townspeople and is put on trial, causing Ares, the god of war to be delighted at the success of his plan.
Episodes.GuestStars: Bill Johnson, Christopher Mayer, Danny Lineham, Christian Hodge, Phaedra Hurst, Meryl Main, Sam Holland, Ross Harper

Episodes.Title: The Titans
Episodes.Plot: Gabrielle fools around with an ancient scroll and releases three Titans from centuries of captivity. Once again, Xena must save a village from destruction. Gabrielle also finds time for love.
Episodes.GuestStars: Mark Raffety, Amanda Tollemache, Edward Campbell, Andy Anderson, Paolo Rotondo, Syd Mannion, David Mackie, Jack Dacey, Sian Hughes, Peter Morgan, Maggie Tarver, Simon Cameron, Tania Anderson, Julianne Evans

Episodes.Title: Prometheus
Episodes.Plot: When the gods capture Prometheus, mankind begins to lose the gifts he gave them: fire and the ability to heal themselves. It's up to Xena, Gabrielle, Hercules and Iolaus to try to free Prometheus from his chains but whoever is the one who frees him, may end up dead.
Episodes.GuestStars: Kevin Sorbo, Michael Hurst, John Freeman, Jodie Dorday, Paul Norell, Russell Gowers, Sara Wiseman, David Mitchell

Episodes.Title: Death in Chains
Episodes.Plot: Xena must free Hade's sister, Celesta, Death Herself, from King Sisyphus who wants to cheat death by holding her hostage, thus prolonging his life.
Episodes.Director: Charles Siebert, Babs Greyhosky, Adam Armus, Nora Ka
Episodes.GuestStars: Kieren Hutchison, Kate Hodge, Ray Henwood, Leslie Wing, Erik Thomson, Chris Graham, Gordon Hatfield, Paul McLaren, Kelly Greene, Beryl Te Wiata, Wayne England, Allan Wilkins

Episodes.Title: Hooves & Harlots
Episodes.Plot: When Xena and Gabrielle encounter the Amazons, Gabrielle tries to save an Amazon and unwittingly finds herself an Amazon princess.
Episodes.GuestStars: David Aston, Alison Bruce, Mark Ferguson, Rebekah Mercer, Colin Moy, Chris Bailey, Antony Starr, John Watson, Aurora Philips, Tanya Dignan, Andrew Kovacevich

Episodes.Title: The Black Wolf
Episodes.Plot: Xena infiltrates a band of rebels led by the Black Wolf and helps them defend themselves against Xerxes the warlord.
Episodes.GuestStars: Robert Trebor, Kevin J. Wilson, Nigel Harbrow, Emma Turner, Ian Hughes, Maggie Tarver, Ross Duncan, John Dybvig, Jonathan Bell-Booth, John Pemberton, Tim Hosking, Colin Francis, Adam Middleton, Jimmy Rawdon

Episodes.Title: Beware Greeks Bearing Gifts
Episodes.Plot: Helen of Troy summons Xena and asks her to help end the war between the Greeks and the Trojans, that began over her.
Episodes.Director: T.J. Scott, Roy Thomas, Janis Hendler
Episodes.GuestStars: Scott Garrison, Galyn Gorg, Warren Carl, Cameron Rhodes, Ken Blackburn, Adrian Keeling, Aidan MacBride Stewart, John Manning, Mathews Jeffs, Peter Ford, Geoffrey Knight

Episodes.Title: Athens City Academy of the Performing Bards
Episodes.Plot: Gabrielle wants to enter the Athens City Academy of the Performing Bards, but finds that it is not quite what she thought it would be. She helps another aspiring bard discover his true storytelling talent.
Episodes.GuestStars: Dean O'Gorman, Grahame Moore, Patrick Brunton, David Weatherley, Joseph Manning, Bernard Moody, Lori Dungey

Episodes.Title: A Fistful of Dinars
Episodes.Plot: Xena searches for Ambrosia, a substance capable of turning someone into a god. She hopes to find it before someone who is unworthy to be a god does.
Episodes.GuestStars: Jeremy Roberts, Peter Daube

Episodes.Title: Warrior... Princess
Episodes.Plot: The daughter of King Lias, Diana, is the target of assassins. Fortunately, Xena looks almost exactly like her. So, Xena goes undercover to force the assassins out of hiding and capture them.
Episodes.GuestStars: Lucy Lawless, Michelle Huirama, Jason Hoyte, Latham Gaines

Episodes.Title: Mortal Beloved
Episodes.Plot: When her dead love Marcus, asks Xena to help save good souls, she travels to the underworld to set things right.
Episodes.GuestStars: Michael Hurst, Bobby Hosea, Paul Willis, Erik Thomson, Geoff Clendon, Chantelle Brownlee, John Palmer

Episodes.Title: The Royal Couple of Thieves
Episodes.Plot: Xena enlists the help of Autolycus, the King of Thieves, in order to steal a treasure chest from a warlord and return it to its rightful owners - unless Autolycus has something to say about that.
Episodes.GuestStars: Patrick Khutze, Ian Harrop

Episodes.Title: The Prodigal
Episodes.Plot: After freezing in the face of danger, a confused Gabrielle returns home to Potidaea, where she receives a not-so-warm welcome from the people, who have hired a so-called warrior to save them from a warlord.
Episodes.GuestStars: Tim Thomerson, Margaret Conquest, Alan Palmer, Steve Hall, Wally Green

Episodes.Title: Altared States
Episodes.Plot: A young boy is hunted by his father and brother. They want to sacrifice him to their god, because their "faith" demands it. It's up to Xena and a drugged Gabrielle to save him.
Episodes.GuestStars: David de Lautour, Karl Urban, David Ackroyd

Episodes.Title: Ties That Bind
Episodes.Plot: As the god of war, Ares, schemes to make Xena lead his army, the warrior princess meets a man claiming to be her long-lost father.
Episodes.GuestStars: Tom Atkins, Stephen Lovatt, Sonia Gray, Lutz Halbhubner, Jonathan Whittaker, Heidi Anderson, Robin Kora, Mark Perry, Tony Williams, James Marcum

Episodes.Title: The Greater Good
Episodes.Plot: Xena helps Salmoneus, aka Lord Seltzer, when a warlord wants him dead, due to a bad transaction. Meanwhile, a mysterious blond woman is stalking Xena.
Episodes.GuestStars: Robert Trebor, Peter McCauley, Jonathon Hendry, Natalya Humphrey, David Mitchell

Episodes.Title: Callisto
Episodes.Plot: The female warrior Callisto, tries to turn the world against Xena by committing acts of terrorism in her name, while Xena struggles to reclaim her true identity and discover why this angry young woman is doing this.
Episodes.GuestStars: Hudson Leick, Ian Hughes

Episodes.Title: Death Mask
Episodes.Plot: After learning a raiding party's leader was responsible for the destruction in their village, Xena and her brother set out to destroy him.
Episodes.GuestStars: Joseph Kell, Michael Lawrence, Doug McCaulay, William Davis, Elizabeth Skeen, Peter Needham

Episodes.Title: Is There a Doctor in the House?
Episodes.Plot: Xena attempts to stop a war between two brothers, while Gabrielle tends to a pregnant Amazon sister, who is carrying the child of a centaur.
Episodes.GuestStars: Ray Woolf, Andrew Binns, Charles Pierard, Simon Farthing, Deane Vipond, Harriet Crampton
